# {sknifedatar} üì¶

### Funcionalidades

- **Ajustes m√∫ltiples**: {Modeltime} para m√∫ltiples series de tiempo (sin datos de panel)
- **Adaptaci√≥n de workflowsets al modelado de series de tiempo**: M√∫ltiples modelos y recetas de preprocesamiento con {tidymodels}
- **Automagic tabs**: Generaci√≥n autom√°tica de tabs para presentaci√≤n de resultados (rmarkdown)

---

# Objetivo de la Charla

Presentar el paquete **{skinifedatar}** üì¶ para el modelado y visualizaci√≥n de series de tiempo, tomando como caso de uso datos de viajes en transporte p√∫blico, Argentina (2021-2022). 

Se muestra la compatibilidad con diversos componentes del ecosistema **{tidymodels}** como **{modeltime}**  y **{workflosets}**.

# M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Seleccion de datos**: Se selecciona el departamento **Ferrocarril Roca** 

```{r, fig.height=3, fig.width=10}
data_ffcc_roca <- data %>% 
  filter(linea=='FFCC ROCA') %>% 
  select(-linea) %>% ungroup()
```


```{r}
data_ffcc_roca %>% head(5) %>% kableExtra::kable(format = "html")
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Partici√≥n de datos**: Se particiona el dataset en train y test ‚úÇÔ∏è

```{r, fig.height=3, fig.width=10}
splits <- data_ffcc_roca %>%  initial_time_split(prop = 0.9)
```


```{r, fig.height=5, fig.width=9}
splits %>% tk_time_series_cv_plan() %>%
  plot_time_series_cv_plan(date, value, .title='Partici√≥n temporal') 
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Preprocesamiento / Recetas üßÅ**: Se crea una receta de preprocesamiento, incluye la f√≥rmula a estimar y un paso adicional que a√±ade variables en funci√≥n de la fecha.

```{r}
receta <- recipe(value ~ date, data = training(splits)) %>%
  
  step_date(date, 
            features = c('week', 'month','year','quarter','semester'))
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
receta %>% prep() %>% juice() %>% head(1) %>% gt()
```


---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Modelos**: Definici√≥n y ajuste de modelos sobre train

```{r, eval=TRUE}
# Modelo: Auto-ARIMA
m_autoarima <- arima_reg() %>% 
  set_engine('auto_arima') %>%  
  fit(value~date, data=training(splits))
```


```{r, eval=TRUE}
# Modelo: regresi√≥n lineal
m_reg_lineal <- linear_reg() %>%
  set_engine("lm") %>%
  fit(value ~ as.numeric(date) + 
              factor(month(date, label = TRUE), ordered = FALSE)+
              factor(wday(date, label=TRUE), ordered=FALSE),
      data = training(splits))
```

```{r, eval=TRUE}
# Workflow: prophet boosted
m_prophet_boost <- workflow() %>% 
  add_recipe(receta) %>% 
  add_model(prophet_boost(mode='regression') %>%
            set_engine("prophet_xgboost")) %>% 
  fit(data = training(splits))
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Modeltime Table**

El objeto central del ecosistema **{modeltime}** üì¶ es el **modeltime_table**, el cual incluye todos los modelos entrenados para realizar comparaciones. 

```{r, eval=TRUE}
modelos <- modeltime_table(m_autoarima,
                           m_reg_lineal,
                           m_prophet_boost
                           )
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#saveRDS(modelos, 'modelos/modelos_ffcc_roca.rds')
modelos <- readRDS('modelos/modelos_ffcc_roca.rds')
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
modelos %>% rmarkdown::paged_table(list(rows.print = 6))
```


---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **M√©tricas en Test**

```{r}
calibration_table  <- modelos %>% 
  modeltime_calibrate(new_data = testing(splits))
```

--

```{r, eval=FALSE}
calibration_table %>% 
  modeltime_accuracy()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
calibration_table %>% modeltime_accuracy() %>% 
  select(-.type) %>% 
  rmarkdown::paged_table(list(rows.print = 6))
```


---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **M√©tricas en Test**

```{r}
forecast_series <- calibration_table %>% 
  modeltime_forecast(
    new_data    = testing(splits),
    actual_data = data_ffcc_roca)
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **M√©tricas en Test**

```{r, eval=FALSE}
forecast_series %>% plot_modeltime_forecast()
```

```{r, fig.height=5, fig.width=10, echo=FALSE}
forecast_series %>% 
  plot_modeltime_forecast(
    .legend_max_width     = 30, 
    .interactive          = TRUE,
    .conf_interval_alpha  = 0.2
  )
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Refit y pronostico (pr√≥ximos 2 meses)**

```{r}
refit_tbl <- calibration_table %>%
  filter(.model_id %in% c(1)) %>% 
  modeltime_refit(data = data_ffcc_roca)
```


```{r}
forecast_final <- refit_tbl %>% 
  modeltime_forecast(
    actual_data = data_ffcc_roca,
    h='2 months'
  )
```

---
## M√∫ltiples modelos sobre una serie

* **Visualizaci√≥n de la proyecci√≥n a 2 meses**

```{r, eval=FALSE}
forecast_final %>% plot_modeltime_forecast()
```

```{r, fig.height=5, fig.width=10, echo=FALSE}
forecast_final %>% 
  plot_modeltime_forecast(
    .legend_max_width = 30, 
    .interactive      = FALSE,
    .conf_interval_alpha = 0.2
)
```

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **Selecci√≥n de datos**

```{r}
nest_data <- data %>% ungroup() %>% nest(nested_column = -linea)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.height='10%'}
reactable::reactable(nest_data, details = function(index) {
  data <- data[data$linea == nest_data$linea[index], c('date','value')] %>% 
    mutate(value = round(value, 2))
  htmltools::div(style = "padding: 10px", reactable::reactable(data, outlined = TRUE))
}, defaultPageSize=4) 
```


---

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **Modeltime Table Multifit**

```{r}
receta <- recipe(value ~ date, data = data %>% select(-linea)) %>%
  
  step_date(
    date,
    features = c('week', 'month', 'year', 'quarter', 'semester'))
```



---

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **Definici√≥n de modelos**

```{r}
# Modelo: tbats
m_tbats <-seasonal_reg() %>% set_engine("tbats")
```

```{r}
# Modelo stlm_arima
m_seasonal <- seasonal_reg() %>% set_engine("stlm_arima")
```

```{r}
# Workflow: prophet boosted
m_prophet_boost <- workflow() %>% 
  add_recipe(receta) %>% 
  add_model(
    prophet_boost(mode='regression') %>%
    set_engine("prophet_xgboost")
  )
```


---




## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **Modeltime Table Multifit**

```{r ,eval=TRUE}
model_table <- modeltime_multifit(serie = nest_data,
                                  .prop = 0.9,
                                  m_tbats,
                                  m_seasonal,
                                  m_prophet_boost
                                  ) 
```

```{r ,echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#saveRDS(model_table, 'modelos/model_table.rds')
model_table <- readRDS(here::here("modelos","model_table.rds"))
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **M√©tricas en la partici√≥n de evaluaci√≥n**

```{r,eval=FALSE}
model_table$models_accuracy 
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
model_table$models_accuracy %>% 
  rmarkdown::paged_table(list(rows.print = 6))
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **Forecast sobre la partici√≥n de evaluaci√≥n**

```{r}
forecast_series <- modeltime_multiforecast(
  models_table=model_table$table_time, .prop = 0.9
)
```

---

```{r, fig.height=6, fig.width=10, eval=FALSE}
forecast_series %>% select(linea, nested_forecast) %>% 
  unnest(nested_forecast) %>% 
  group_by(linea) %>% 
  plot_modeltime_forecast() 
```


```{r, fig.height=6, fig.width=10, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
forecast_series %>% 
  select(linea, nested_forecast) %>% 
  unnest(nested_forecast) %>% 
  group_by(linea) %>% 
  plot_modeltime_forecast(
    .legend_max_width = 20,
    .facet_ncol = 2, 
    .line_size = 0.5,
    .interactive = FALSE,
    .facet_scales = 'free_y',
    .title='Proyecciones') +
    theme(legend.direction = 'vertical', legend.position = 'right')
```


---

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series

* **Selecci√≥n del mejor modelo para cada serie**

```{r}
best_models <- modeltime_multibestmodel(
  .table = forecast_series,
  .metric = "mae"
)
```

---

```{r, eval=FALSE}
best_models %>% 
  select(linea, nested_forecast) %>% 
  unnest(nested_forecast) %>% 
  group_by(linea) %>% 
  plot_modeltime_forecast() 
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=6}
best_models %>% 
  select(linea, nested_forecast) %>% 
  unnest(nested_forecast) %>% 
  group_by(linea) %>% 
  plot_modeltime_forecast(
    .legend_max_width = 20,
    .interactive = FALSE,
    .facet_scales = 'free_y', 
    .facet_ncol=2
    ) +
  theme(legend.direction = 'vertical', legend.position = 'right')
```

---

## M√∫ltiples modelos - m√∫ltiples series
